bug.author: ghandic
bug.summary: Polygon and Rectangle examples returning errors
bug.description:
When using or examples from <denchmark-link:https://labelstud.io/tags/rectangle.html>https://labelstud.io/tags/rectangle.html</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://labelstud.io/tags/polygon.html>https://labelstud.io/tags/polygon.html</denchmark-link> respectively inside the config.xml using the autogenerated sample data it crashes on the frontend (spinner of death) and in the browser console there was an error To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Copy example Tag code from docs Add into config.xml Autogenerate a task Add 1 or more polygons and submit (if using Rectangle just clicking the image breaks the UI and console logs error: TypeError: "e is null"
Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: Backend running in Docker, host machine: MacOS 10.15.4 Browser: Firefox 75.0
Additional context I can use PolygonLabels and RectangleLabels as a workaround but would be nicer to use Rectangle and Polygon as I have only one type of object to detect
